strategy: Triple Alignment: model pick + value bet side + MC agree. Top 10 by composite score (confidence + edge + EV + triple bonus). Max 3 per sport (NFL/NBA/NHL/MLB/NCAAF/NCAAB). Consensus odds (up to 3 books).
hint: Odds source: The Odds API (the-odds-api.com). Check quota and regions if key is set.

technology.consensus_odds: Up to 5 bookmakers averaged to reduce single-book bias
technology.top_n: Best 10 picks only, sport-diverse (max 3 per league)

dimensions.NIG: News Impact Grade - Breaking news effect
